meanings.sent1: Tommy is always acting like a bunch of goobers in class.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to those goobers, they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The goobers at the party kept telling jokes that no one understood.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a goober when she tripped over her own feet in front of everyone.
meanings.sent5: The movie character was portrayed as a lovable goober who always made people laugh.

meanings.sent1: I love snacking on goobers while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: The trail mix had a good mix of raisins and goobers.
meanings.sent3: The elephant at the zoo happily munched on a pile of goobers.
meanings.sent4: She tossed a handful of goobers to the squirrels in the park.
meanings.sent5: The baseball game had vendors selling hot dogs, popcorn, and goobers.
